pullRequest.title: Check duplicate fields when building class definition
pullRequest.bodyText:
ClassDefinitionBuider.addX methods checks if a field
is already added with same name and
throws HazelcastSerializatioException if already added.
fixes #17616
(cherry picked from commit 344a0b0)
Backport of: #17682

beforeCommit.message:
Check duplicate fields when building class definition

ClassDefinitionBuider.addX methods checks if a field
is already added with same name and
throws HazelcastSerializatioException if already added.

fixes https://github.com/hazelcast/hazelcast/issues/17616

(cherry picked from commit 344a0b0df7ca238bb43afd5e5bf516ec4371c1c7)

nodes.bodyText: nit: "will be added" (also in other methods' javadoc)
invocation of build() can be removed since the exception is expected from the second add* method

commit.message: address review comments. Javadoc and test update.
